name: Real Moto Rider
description:
Real Moto Rider is an amazing free game for bike lovers.

The passion for bike racing increases when you become fearless and drive at extreme speeds right? We understand that, that's why we are here with another exciting racing game, Extreme Real Moto Rider that will surely help you quench your thirst for extreme speed.

Start Turbo Engines of your heavy bike ,accelerate and race with naughty sports cars traffic moving fast around you.

Game Features:
- Superb scenery and realistic bike physics!
- Simple touch and tilt controls!
- Rocking sound track to ride to!

DOWNLOAD AND RIDE TODAY!
